sql-statements.statement: App::Statements::Scheduling
insert into Person_Attribute (parent_id, item_name , value_int, value_intB) values (? , 'ApptSheet Times', ? , ? )
select item_id, value_int from Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = ?

select to_char(start_time - ?, 'hh24mi') as start_minute, to_char(start_time - ?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') as start_day, duration, event_id, ea.value_text as patient_id, ea.value_textB as resource_id, Event.parent_id, Event.appt_type from Event_Attribute ea, Event where start_time between to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and discard_type is null and event_status in (0,1,2) and facility_id = ? and ea.parent_id = event_id and ea.value_textB = ? and ea.value_type = 333 order by nvl(Event.parent_id, 0), event_id
select id, caption from appt_duration
select value_int as start_time, value_intB as end_time from Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = 'ApptSheet Times'
select * from Appt_Type where appt_type_id = ?

select distinct appt_type_id, r_ids, caption, duration, lead_time, lag_time, decode(back_to_back, 0, 'No', 1, 'Yes', 'No'), decode(multiple, 0, 'No', 1, 'Yes', 'No'), num_sim, am_limit, pm_limit, rr_ids, day_limit from Appt_Type_R_Ids, Appt_Type where owner_org_id = ? and (upper(member_name) = upper(?) or upper(r_ids) like upper(?)) and upper(caption) like upper(?) and Appt_Type_R_Ids.parent_id = appt_type_id order by caption, r_ids, appt_type_id
select value_text as resource_id, value_textb as facility_id from Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and value_type = 250 and item_name = 'Physician' and parent_org_id = ?

select item_id, value_text as resource_id, org_id as facility_id, nvl(value_intb, 0) as date_offset from Org, Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = 'Preference/Schedule/DayView/Column' and value_int = ? and org_internal_id (+) = to_number(value_textb) and Person_Attribute.parent_org_id = ?
select complete_name from Person where person_id = ?
select count(*) +1 from Event where parent_id = ? and event_status < 3

select template_id, r_ids as resources, caption, org_id, to_char(start_time - ?, 'HH:MI AM') as start_time, to_char(end_time - ?, 'HH:MI AM') as end_time, to_char(effective_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as begin_date, to_char(effective_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as end_date, decode(available,0,'Not Available',1,'Available') as available, patient_types, appt_types, days_of_month, months, days_of_week from Org, Sch_Template where Sch_Template.owner_org_id = ? and facility_id = org_internal_id and upper(r_ids) like upper(?) and upper(org_id) like upper(?) and (available = ? or available = ?) and status = ? and nvl(effective_end_date, sysdate+1) > sysdate order by available, r_ids, template_id

select e.event_id, e.parent_id, e.facility_id as service_facility_id, e.event_status, e.event_type, e.subject, to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as start_time, e.duration, e.remarks, e.owner_id, e.scheduled_by_id, e.scheduled_stamp, e.checkin_by_id, at.caption as appt_type, ea.value_text as attendee_id, ea.value_int as attendee_type, ea.value_textB as care_provider_id, '2' as bill_type from Appt_Type at, Event_Attribute ea, Event e where e.event_id = ? and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and ea.value_type = 333 and at.appt_type_id(+) = e.appt_type
select * from event_attribute where parent_id = ? and value_type = ?
select * from Event where event_id = ?

select event_type, subject, duration, remarks, facility_id, value_int as attendee_type from Event_Attribute, Event where event_id = ? and Event_Attribute.parent_id = Event.event_id and Event_Attribute.value_type = 333
select distinct o.ORG_ID, o.NAME_PRIMARY from org o, org_category oc where o.ORG_ID = oc.PARENT_ID and UPPER(oc.MEMBER_NAME) in ('FACILITY','CLINIC')
select name_primary from Org where org_internal_id = ?

select template_id, r_ids as resources, caption, org_id, to_char(start_time - ?, 'HH:MI AM') as start_time, to_char(end_time - ?, 'HH:MI AM') as end_time, to_char(effective_begin_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as begin_date, to_char(effective_end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as end_date, decode(available,0,'Not Available',1,'Available') as available, patient_types, appt_types, days_of_month, months, days_of_week from Org, Sch_Template where Sch_Template.owner_org_id = ? and facility_id = org_internal_id and upper(r_ids) like upper(?) and upper(org_id) like upper(?) and (available = ? or available = ?) and (status = ? or ( effective_end_date is NOT NULL and trunc(effective_end_date) < trunc(sysdate) ) ) order by available, r_ids, template_id
select min(event_id) from Event where parent_id = ? and event_status < 3
select count(*) from Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = 'Preference/Schedule/DayView/Column' and parent_org_id = ?
select value_intB from Event_Attribute where parent_id = ? and value_intB is NOT NULL
select parent_id from Event where event_id = ?

select complete_name, pa1.value_text as hphone, pa2.value_text as wphone, complete_addr_html, pa3.value_text as email from Person_Address, Person_Attribute pa3, Person_Attribute pa2, Person_Attribute pa1, Person where person_id = ? and pa1.parent_id (+) = Person.person_id and pa1.item_name (+) = 'Contact Method/Telephone/Home' and pa2.parent_id (+) = Person.person_id and pa2.item_name (+) = 'Contact Method/Telephone/Work' and pa3.parent_id (+) = Person.person_id and pa3.item_name (+) = 'Contact Method/EMail/Primary' and Person_Address.parent_id = Person.person_id
select id, caption from Appt_Attendee_Type
select id, caption from Appt_Attendee_Type UNION select -1 as id, ' ' as caption from dual order by caption

select e.event_id, e.facility_id, e.event_status, e.event_type, e.subject, to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as appt_date_0, to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'HH:MI AM') as appt_time_0, e.duration, e.remarks, e.owner_id, e.scheduled_by_id, e.scheduled_stamp, e.checkin_by_id, ea.value_text as attendee_id, ea.value_int as patient_type, ea.value_textB as resource_id, e.appt_type, e.parent_id, e.superbill_id from Event_Attribute ea, event e where event_id = ? and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and ea.value_type = 333
select appt_type_id, r_ids, caption, duration, lead_time, lag_time, back_to_back, multiple, num_sim, rr_ids, am_limit, pm_limit, day_limit, superbill_id from Appt_Type where appt_type_id = ?

select template_id, caption, r_ids, facility_id, available, status, remarks, preferences, days_of_month, months, days_of_week, patient_types, appt_types, to_char(effective_begin_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') as effective_begin_date, to_char(effective_end_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') as effective_end_date, to_char(start_time - ?, 'HH:MI AM') as duration_begin_time, to_char(end_time - ?,'HH:MI AM') as duration_end_time from Sch_Template_R_Ids, Sch_Template where template_id = ? and parent_id = template_id and rownum = 1
select distinct attendee_id from Template where facility_id = ?
select translate(caption, '/ ', '__') as caption from Medical_Specialty where group_name = 'Physician Specialty' UNION select ' ' as caption from Dual order by caption
select distinct member_name from Sch_Template_R_Ids where upper(member_name) like ?
select item_id, value_text as resource_id, value_textb as facility_id, value_int as column_no, value_intb as offset from Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = ? order by column_no

select item_id, value_text as resource_id, value_textb as facility_id, value_int as column_no, value_intb as offset from Person_Attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = ? and parent_org_id = ? order by column_no

select value_text, event_id from Event_Attribute, Event where Event.parent_id = ? and Event_Attribute.parent_id = Event.event_id and Event_Attribute.value_type = 333 union select 'None' as value_text, 9999999999999999 as event_id from Dual order by event_id
select appt_type_id, caption || ' (' || appt_type_id || ')' as caption from Appt_Type where owner_org_id = ? order by upper(caption)

select appt_type_id, caption || ' (' || appt_type_id || ')' as caption, upper(caption) as upperCaption from Appt_Type where owner_org_id = ? UNION select 0 as appt_type_id, ' ' as caption, ' ' as upperCaption from Dual order by 3

select internal_catalog_id, catalog_id || ' (' || caption || ')' as caption, upper(catalog_id) as upperCaption from Offering_catalog where org_internal_id = ? and catalog_type = 4 UNION select 0 as internal_catalog_id, ' ' as caption, ' ' as upperCaption from Dual order by 3

select to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'hh24mi') as start_minute, to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') as start_day, e.duration, e.event_id, ea.value_text as patient_id, ea.value_textB as resource_id, patient.name_last || ', ' || substr(patient.name_first,1,1) as short_patient_name, patient.complete_name as patient_complete_name, initcap(e.subject) as subject, aat.caption as patient_type, initcap(e.remarks) as remarks, e.event_status, e.facility_id, to_char(e.checkin_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkin_stamp, to_char(e.checkout_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkout_stamp, stat.caption as appt_status, e.parent_id, e.scheduled_by_id, to_char(e.scheduled_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as scheduled_stamp, at.caption as appt_type, e.appt_type as appt_type_id, initcap(patient.complete_sortable_name) as patient_name from Appt_Type at, Appt_Status stat, Appt_Attendee_type aat, Person patient, Event_Attribute ea, Event e where e.start_time >= to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and e.start_time < to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and e.discard_type is null and e.event_status in (0,1,2) and e.facility_id = ? and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and ea.value_text = patient.person_id and upper(ea.value_textB) = upper(?) and ea.value_type = 333 and aat.id = ea.value_int and stat.id = e.event_status and at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type order by nvl(e.parent_id, 0), e.event_id

select value_text as patient_id from event_attribute ea, event e where e.event_id = ? and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and exists (select 'x' from transaction t where t.trans_owner_id = ea.value_text and t.trans_status = 2 and t.trans_type = 8026 )
select 'x' from transaction t where t.trans_owner_id = upper(?) and t.trans_status = 2 and t.trans_type = 8026 and rownum < 2

select event_status, checkin_by_id, checkout_by_id, discard_by_id, to_char(checkin_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkin_stamp, to_char(checkout_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkout_stamp, to_char(discard_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as discard_stamp, Appt_Discard_type.caption as discard_type from Appt_Discard_type, Event where event_id = ? and Appt_Discard_type.id(+) = Event.discard_type

select to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'hh24mi') as start_minute, to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') as start_day, e.duration, e.event_id, ea.value_text as patient_id, ea.value_textB as resource_id, patient.name_last || ', ' || substr(patient.name_first,1,1) as short_patient_name, patient.complete_name as patient_complete_name, initcap(e.subject) as subject, aat.caption as patient_type, initcap(e.remarks) as remarks, e.event_status, e.facility_id, to_char(e.checkin_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkin_stamp, to_char(e.checkout_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkout_stamp, stat.caption as appt_status, e.parent_id, e.scheduled_by_id, to_char(e.scheduled_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as scheduled_stamp, at.caption as appt_type, e.appt_type as appt_type_id, initcap(patient.complete_sortable_name) as patient_name from Appt_Type at, Appt_Status stat, Appt_Attendee_type aat, Person patient, Event_Attribute ea, Event e where e.start_time >= to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and e.start_time < to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and e.discard_type is null and e.event_status in (0,1,2) and e.facility_id > ? and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and ea.value_text = patient.person_id and upper(ea.value_textB) = upper(?) and ea.value_type = 333 and aat.id = ea.value_int and stat.id = e.event_status and at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type order by e.start_time, nvl(e.parent_id, 0), e.event_id

select to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'hh24mi') as start_minute, to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') as start_day, e.duration, e.event_id, ea.value_text as patient_id, ea.value_textB as resource_id, patient.name_last || ', ' || substr(patient.name_first,1,1) as short_patient_name, patient.complete_name as patient_complete_name, initcap(e.subject) as subject, aat.caption as patient_type, initcap(e.remarks) as remarks, e.event_status, e.facility_id, to_char(e.checkin_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkin_stamp, to_char(e.checkout_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as checkout_stamp, stat.caption as appt_status, e.parent_id, e.scheduled_by_id, to_char(e.scheduled_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as scheduled_stamp, at.caption as appt_type, e.appt_type as appt_type_id, initcap(patient.complete_sortable_name) as patient_name from Appt_Type at, Appt_Status stat, Appt_Attendee_type aat, Person patient, Event_Attribute ea, Event e where e.start_time >= to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and e.start_time < to_date(?, 'yyyy,mm,dd') + ? and e.discard_type is null and e.event_status in (0,1,2) and e.facility_id = ? and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and ea.value_text = patient.person_id and upper(ea.value_textB) = upper(?) and ea.value_type = 333 and aat.id = ea.value_int and stat.id = e.event_status and at.appt_type_id (+) = e.appt_type order by e.start_time, nvl(e.parent_id, 0), e.event_id
select distinct facility_id from Sch_Template where owner_org_id = ?
select distinct org_internal_id, org_id from Org, Sch_Template where upper(org_id) like upper(?) and Org.org_internal_id = Sch_Template.facility_id and Sch_Template.owner_org_id = ?

select to_char(e.start_time - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') appt_time, ea.value_textB as physician, e.subject, e.event_id from Event_Attribute ea, Event e where e.start_time > sysdate and ea.parent_id = e.event_id and upper(ea.value_text) = upper(?) and e.owner_id = ? and e.event_status = 0 order by e.start_time
select distinct member_name as person_id from Sch_Template_R_Ids where upper(member_name) like upper(?) and parent_id in (select template_id from Sch_Template where owner_org_id = ?)
select distinct member_name as resource_id from Sch_Template_R_Ids where parent_id in (select template_id from Sch_Template where owner_org_id = ?)

select Invoice.invoice_id, to_char(value_date - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as void_stamp, Invoice_History.cr_user_id from Invoice_History, Invoice, Transaction, Event where Event.event_id = ? and Transaction.parent_event_id = Event.event_id and Invoice.main_transaction = Transaction.trans_id and Invoice.invoice_status = 16 and Invoice_History.parent_id = Invoice.invoice_id and Invoice_History.value_text = 'Voided claim'
update Person_Attribute set value_int = ?, value_intB = ? where parent_id = ? and item_name = 'ApptSheet Times'

update Event_Attribute set value_textB = ? where upper(value_textB) = upper(?) and parent_id in (select event_id from Event where start_time between to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + ? and to_date (?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + ? +1 and facility_id = ? )

update Event_Attribute set value_textB = ? where upper(value_textB) = upper(?) and parent_id in (select event_id from Event where start_time between to_date(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + ? and to_date (?, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + ? +1 and owner_id = ? )
update Event_Attribute set value_intB = NULL where value_type = 333 and value_intB <= 0
update Event set parent_id = NULL where event_id = ?
update Person_Attribute set value_int = value_int-1 where parent_id = ? and value_int > ? and item_name like 'Preference/Schedule/DayView/Column%' and parent_org_id = ?
update Event set parent_id = ? where parent_id = ?
update Event_Attribute set value_intB = value_intB -1 where parent_id in (select event_id from Event where Event.parent_id = ?) and value_intB > ?
update Event_Attribute set value_intB = value_intB -1 where parent_id in (select event_id from Event where Event.parent_id = ? and event_status < 3)
